name: Wild Magic Rodeo
description:
Your latest magical experiment to make a powerful staff went wrong. Now it is charging up power at an unbelievable rate and you have to find a way to get rid of it before it's too late. Thankfully, you have a large number of elemental stones lying around which you can use to safely drain the power. 

How long can you last before it all goes up in smoke?

All art and programming done by me
